lead_paragraph: Seton Hall coach Tony Bozzella joked just before tipoff that he was going to apologize ahead of time for any colorful language viewers heard during Fox Sports' innovative broadcast of the Pirates' game against St. John's on Friday night.

headline.print_headline: Fans Get All-Access in Unusual Seton Hall-St John's Telecast
headline.main: Fans Get All-Access in Unusual Seton Hall-St John's Telecast
